description: Access object to modern runtime mapping policy. Explicit entries take precedence over wildcard rules.

rules.name: query_default
rules.runtime_justification: Saved-query semantics are enforced through parity inventory, dependency ordering, and table-tap validation artifacts before modern API/report execution.

rules.name: report_default
rules.runtime_justification: Legacy report intent is represented by modern report payload generation and renderer templates; Access report runtime parity is separately validated in the Windows execution harness.

rules.name: module_default
rules.runtime_justification: VBA module behavior is enforced via Access compile/invocation evidence in Windows parity execution and mapped to modern API/service orchestration.

modAPI_Calls.runtime_justification: External/API-facing automation is represented by modern HTTP service integrations in the Node runtime.

modAccessWindowsUtilities.runtime_justification: Access runtime window/process behavior remains validated in the Windows COM harness rather than reimplemented on non-Windows hosts.

modApplication Shared - Functions.runtime_justification: Shared calculation/flow orchestration has been centralized in the modern service layer with parity evidence artifacts.

modAutoExec Functions and Globals.runtime_justification: Startup globals and bootstrapping are represented by importer initialization plus server startup checks.

modCombine_Files_Functions.runtime_justification: Legacy file-combine report generation maps to modern report/case-packet export logic and template rendering.

modCombine_Files_Functions_with_Adobe.runtime_justification: Adobe/report-combine variants are covered by modern markdown/PDF pipeline and export parity validation.

modErrorHandler.runtime_justification: Error handling is mapped to API/runtime exception handling and strict parity gate failures.

modMVQS Functions.runtime_justification: Core MVQS calculations are represented in modern computation and report assembly endpoints.

modOpenFile.runtime_justification: Legacy open-file actions map to modern case/report export and retrieval endpoints.
